tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was very supportive to me.since i had to travel 200km to reach her,she asked me to come only when needed.i visited few doctors in my first pregnancy where they told me to end my pregnancy as it's impossible with multiple fibroids and I ended it up there.i visited her for second pregnancy that is when I surprised, because she told me that fibroids is not at all an issue and I shouldn't have ended the first pregnancy.from there she encouraged me alot.today am really happy that I had a normal delivery

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First and foremost I'd like to mention about the doctor is that we are truly blessed to have a Bharati mam not only as a doctor but she is more than that and one of d best thing is that she is so caring and supporting and she gives time for each patient and provide solutions accordingly which is very important.
I don't know whether I should thank God or Bharati mam because of their/her proper guidance we are going to become a happy parents. I don't have a word to tell about Bharati mam . Last but not the least would recommend everyone to please visit for her guidance and I am sure that everyone will be satisfied.
Thanku Bharati mam for coming to our life ...May God gives u all happiness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited Dr. Bharathi for a normal vaginal delivery.  From the outset she was very progressive, discussed our birth plan in detail and gave us a lot quality time to discuss our questions despite her busy schedule. Her consideration for our birth preferences coupled with her clarity in medical decision making gave us confidence even when we were not sure of outcomes.  She really supported an NVD right till the end, and tried every safe intervention possible for an NVD until finally discussing the c-section option. Her objectivity and considerate decision making makes is confident that we made the right elective choices in our pregnancy.   A fantastically competent doctor that we would highly recommend !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Ovarian Cyst Removal, Ovarian Cyst,Salpingo Oopherectomy,
review: I approached Dr. Bharati with a diagnosis of endometriotic left ovarian cyst. After patiently going through all my past health records she very meticulously explained the various treatment options with the pros and cons of each approach. The surgery was conducted 2 weeks back. It was very smoothly carried out by her and I also had my post operative consultation yesterday where she clearly explained steps to be taken to prevent recurrence. All the interactions with her were extremely comfortable. I would definitely recommend Dr Bharati for her immense patience and amicable nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: With lot of Google search and reviews, I opted Aster CMI for my wife (second pregnancy). I am here today to tell my experience during her pregnancy and the hospital stay. The gync Dr Bharathi kamogi was very caring, highly experienced, supported and guided her well through out her pregnancy. We had to opt for c section due to GDM. Hence stayed in hospital for 3 days. The complete staff made our stay very memorable and supported us so well that my wife was extremely happy. They took care of the baby very well, helped my wife in every aspect till she gains confidence in handling the baby. We want to thank the hospital staff and Dr. Bharathi Mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: One of the finest doctor i have ever met..i approached dr bharthi kamoji for my mothers hysterectomy..initially we were skeptical to undergo abdominal hysterectomy due to its long recovery period..but bharti maam gave us assurance to go ahead with the abdominal hysterectomy as it doesnt have any post operative problems and told us my mother would recover very fast..I am really grateful to the doctor bharthi maam ..as my mothers surgery went really well and she is recovering quite well..I would recommend Dr bharthi maam to whoe ever has any sort of gynec issues..Thanks a ton

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnant Women Counseling,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review: Dr Bharti, i am really obliged to say Thank you so much for all your support you have given me throughout my pregnancy. I really feel positive whenever i speak to you. You are really understanding, calm, humble in taking care of the issues we speak to you and provide solution with ease. You make all problems look small when we speak to you. We were not able to call our parents due to Covid-19, but Dr Bharti told us, no problem just you and your husband are enough for delivery and she was also there. She followed up continuously with the duty doctors on my condition And i was taken to labour room at 3 , we didn’t expect at 5am at peak of my delivery that also at with just 1 phone call she will come to hospital and she was really there at the time of delivery. I really have no words to express as to how happy i was to see her in the labor room at that time. Frankly, how super super happy i am with your consultation and support. My best advice is if you are planning or already in your pregnancy, you can definitely consultant Dr Bharti without any fear and it will be wonders. And now for lifetime i will consult  Dr Bharti for anything and everything.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Bharathi Ma'am was able to identify ovarian torsion and also did laparoscopy. I had no hopes of conceiving. She gave me medications which helped my body to recover and concieve. Ma'am doesn't prescribe too much medicine unless need. 
After conceiving, ma'am was my saviour and biggest trust. love the way she makes her patient feel comfortable. My delivery and labor went smooth and safe.  Always thankful and grateful to Bharathi ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Bharti kamoji, I really feel blessed that I was under your guidance. Thank you so much for your all support and care which you gave me throughout my pregnancy. Your right guidence was really needed in my last months. You gave me enough confidence throughout the treatment.omna

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: *** ** ********* ************* *** *******. Her patience, friendliness and compassion are exemplary. I went to her with the problem of abnormal periods and after extensive consultation she suggested and performed a hysterectomy for me just 3 weeks back. The team that works with her is also excellent and dedicated to their work. I have recovered very well, and I am grateful that she and her team supported me so well during the process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is an experienced doctor and that showed in her interaction with us. It was a general check up and she did the scan too. She explained us the medical situation in detail and the way forward to handle it. We will be visiting her again for a follow up check up as recommended by her.

The waiting time at the hospital can be managed better though. Despite having a prior appointment and being early at the hospital, we had to wait an hour and a half for our turn post our appointment time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We wanted to have a normal delivery and Bharti mam helped us throughout the journey.  We were in regular consultations and always walked out with a positive attitude after talking to mam. 
On the D day the induced labor pain started to kick in but the cervix was not dilated enough. Adding on top of it meconium was found during the water break. Mam was in analyzing the situation and helped us understand the situation. Baby's heart beat was decreasing during contractions and Mam actually turned the baby's head and helped us deliver the baby normally. 

Really thankful for all help and would recommend Bharti mam all the time if couples are looking for normal vaginal birth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I would highly recommend Bharathi mam as I had lost of complications I unfortunately would have delevered by 7th month of my pregnancy where I had left hope of having normal delevery I visited Bharathi mam and explained about my health issue she asked me to wait not to rush n had given asurity of normal delevery and she was on her words as my AFI index was low thoe she helped me giving a birth to health child and obviously health me with normal delivery thankyou so much I would be glad to give this review with lots of love and prayers may god bless her with good health ameen

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Went to Dr.Bharati after a friend recommended her for Gynac consultation. i was extremely happy with her calm demeanor and factual approach. contacted her again after getting pregnant and she was so helpful during the whole time. due to Covid, she asked us to consult through phone and message, and she was following up constantly. even during labour (it was Sunday, and she wasnt on duty) she came to hospital and helped me remain calm, conveyed the facts, and what has to be done. Baby was not in position for normal delivery, but she gave me some time and suggested how the baby could be brought in position in next 1 hour. I had a NVD with a 4kg baby,  which is not so common. We are extremely thankful for coming in contact with her, and In the whole duration of pregnancy, she guided us very well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had a laparoscopic hysterectomy done by Dr.Bharati and I think I owe my recovery and health to her! She avoids unnecessary medication, gives detailed explanation and is very accessible. Grateful to have found her.
Thanks Doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Past from 3 year I was suffering from pcod problem now.I completely cured thanks to doctor bharati kimoji

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: What to say about Dr.Bharathi, one of the finest human I met, not only she is expertise in her Field, she is expertised in making patients comfortable. * **** **** ****** **** ****** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I had a good experience with doctor. Doctor was friendly and listening patiently, I felt satisfied..         Overall it was good.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I was treated by Dr. Bharati Kamoji who took good care of me from the first consultation session until the end of my operation. I would like to salute her professionalism, patience and above all her competence which greatly contributed to the success of my operation. I would like to show her all my gratitude. 
Tantely Randrianampizafy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I took my wife for Pregnancy, Dr Bharathi madam made her very comfortable and explained about the Pregnancy Delivery process completely and encouraged her for Normal Delivery, It happened...! Doctor was friendly and answered all quire's rised by our end. Myself & my Wife is completely Satisfied with Doctors care, I would like to recommend Dr Bharathi madam to all my Friends & Family, Thank you mam.
